column4: hi, i have some spare time, and i was thinking in reading, finally, for once and for all, the scary 4k lines man bash. i alwasy droped it after 300 or 400 lines. now im willing to make it throu to the end. but then i also thought about emacs, vi(m), perl, awk. id like to learn all that. which one you think would me more useful and worth?
